## Feature Description

A clear and concise description of the feature you'd like to see.

## Problem Statement

What problem would this feature solve? Why is this feature needed?

Example: "I'm always frustrated when..."

## Proposed Solution

Describe how you envision this feature working. Be as specific as possible.

## Alternative Solutions

Have you considered any alternative approaches or workarounds?

## Use Cases

Describe specific scenarios where this feature would be useful:

1. **Use Case 1**: [Description]
2. **Use Case 2**: [Description]

## Mockups/Examples

If applicable, add mockups, wireframes, or examples from other applications.

## Impact Assessment

- **Users Affected**: [Who would benefit? All users, coaches, specific use cases]
- **Complexity**: [Low/Medium/High - your estimate]
- **Priority**: [Nice to have / Important / Critical]

## Implementation Considerations

Are there any technical considerations you're aware of?

- [ ] Requires backend/database changes
- [ ] May affect existing functionality
- [ ] Has security implications
- [ ] Requires third-party integration
- [ ] Accessibility considerations

## Alignment with Project Goals

How does this feature align with the "ship, don't infrastructure" philosophy?

- [ ] Adds user value without excessive complexity
- [ ] Can be implemented incrementally
- [ ] Doesn't require major architectural changes

## Additional Context

Any other information that would help evaluate this feature request.
